mapper.select: SELECT pk_Bespoke, besp_ResePaymentCode, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) AS eleCode, (ui.norm_real_name) AS username, (go.grou_GroupName) AS groupname, besp_BespokePrice, besp_BeginTime, besp_EndTime, besp_RealityTime, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) AS eleHeadName, besp_BespokeStatus, besp_OrderType FROM tbl_Bespoke bp INNER JOIN tbl_User_normal AS ui ON ui.user_id = bp.besp_UserInfo INNER JOIN tbl_Group AS go ON go.pk_Group = ui.usIn_GroupID INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.pk_ElectricPile = bp.besp_ElectricPileId INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricpileHead = ep.pk_ElectricPile where pk_Bespoke#{pkBespoke}

SELECT pk_Bespoke, besp_ResePaymentCode, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) as eleCode, (ui.norm_real_name) as username, (ui.user_account) as usPhone, besp_BespokePrice, besp_BeginTime, besp_EndTime, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) as eleHeadName, besp_Bespokestatus, besp_OrderType FROM tbl_Bespoke bp INNER JOIN (SELECT a.user_account, b.* FROM tbl_user a, tbl_user_normal b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id) AS ui ON ui.user_id = bp.besp_UserInfo INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.pk_ElectricPile = bp.besp_ElectricPileId INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricpileHead = ep.pk_ElectricPile where pk_Bespoke#{pkBespoke}

SELECT pk_Bespoke, besp_ResePaymentCode, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) AS eleCode, (pb.puBu_CompanyName) AS comName, besp_BespokePrice, besp_BeginTime, besp_EndTime, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) AS eleHeadName, besp_Bespokestatus, besp_OrderType, besp_RealityTime FROM tbl_Bespoke bp INNER JOIN tbl_PureBusiness AS pb ON pb.pk_PureBusiness = bp.besp_UserInfo INNER JOIN tbl_Group AS go ON go.pk_Group = pb.puBu_GroupID INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.pk_ElectricPile = bp.besp_ElectricPileId INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricpileHead = bp.besp_ElectricPileHead where pk_Bespoke#{pkBespoke}

SELECT pk_Bespoke, besp_ResePaymentCode bespResepaymentcode, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) AS eleCode, ep.elPi_ElectricPileName extValue1, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileName) AS chargePointName, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileAddress) AS chargePointAddress, (bv.company_name) AS comName, besp_FrozenAmt as bespBespokeprice, besp_BeginTime bespBeginTime, besp_EndTime bespEndTime, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) AS eleHeadName, besp_Bespokestatus bespBespokestatus, besp_OrderType bespOrderType, besp_RealityTime bespRealityTime FROM tbl_Bespoke bp left JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.pk_ElectricPile = bp.besp_ElectricPileId left JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricpileHead = bp.besp_ElectricPileHead inner join tbl_user_business_view bv on bv.user_id=ep.elPi_UserId
1=1
and exists( select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b where b.user_id=ep.elPi_UserId and EXISTS (select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b1 where b.busi_company_id=b1.busi_company_id and b1.user_id=#{bespUser}))
and exists (select 1 from tbl_user a where a.user_leval = '3' and a.user_id = ep.elPi_UserId)

and besp_Bespokestatus=#{bespBespokestatus}
and besp_OrderType=#{bespOrderType}
and bv.company_name like concat('%',#{comName},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode like concat('%',#{eleCode},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileName like concat('%',#{chargePointName},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileAddress like concat('%',#{chargePointAddress},'%')
and besp_BeginTime>=#{startDate}
and besp_EndTime<=date_add(#{endDate}, interval 1 day)
